task.title: Making Chocolate Ganache Icing
task.shortdesc: Delicious easy to make chocolate ganache icing for your cakes

taskbody.prereq: Use a good-quality dark chocolate (minimum 65 per cent cocoa solids) for best results

context.p: The ganache is very runny when it is hot, but it sets as it cools, just like butter, so wait for it to set firmly enough to spread comfortably. If you get impatient and use it too soon, it will run down the sides somewhat.

step.cmd: Heat the cream in a saucepan until little bubbles appear around the edges.
Take off the heat and add the chocolate.

step.info: If necessary, heat a little more.

step.cmd: Transfer to a bowl, and allow to cool until stiff enough to spread.
